name: Free Tier
description: Uses only free models — great for experimentation without API costs. Uses GitHub Models (free), Ollama (local), or Groq free-tier models.

Orchestrator.reason: Lightweight coordination — Groq Llama 70B (fast + free), Ollama local, or GitHub Models GPT-4o-mini

Analyser.reason: Code analysis — Groq Llama 70B, DeepSeek V3 (cheap), or GitHub Models GPT-4o-mini

Planner.reason: Plan generation — Groq Llama 70B, DeepSeek V3 (cheap), or GitHub Models GPT-4o-mini

SkillAttributer.reason: Task decomposition — Groq Llama 70B, Ollama local, or GitHub Models GPT-4o-mini

Coder.reason: Code generation — DeepSeek V3 (excellent coder, cheap), Groq Llama 70B, or GitHub Models GPT-4o-mini
